programme.title: Night of the Living Dead
programme.desc: A ragtag group of Pennsylvanians barricade themselves in an old farmhouse to remain safe from a horde of flesh-eating ghouls that are ravaging the United States.

programme.title: RoboDoc: The Creation of RoboCop
programme.desc: A deep dive into the making of the sci-fi masterpiece 'RoboCop.'

programme.title: RoboDoc: The Creation of RoboCop
programme.desc: With the production in full swing, director Paul Verhoeven is pushing the envelope and many people's buttons; the shoot is heating up, and with the unprecedented filming conditions, the cast and crew are pushed to their limits.

programme.title: RoboDoc: The Creation of RoboCop
programme.desc: Featuring first-hand accounts from the cast and crew, as they relive the golden era of hands-on, practical filmmaking in the 1980s.

programme.title: RoboDoc: The Creation of RoboCop
programme.desc: "The Creation of RoboCop" shows the franchise's impact on the action and science fiction genres, blazing a trail alongside "The Terminator," into the technologically driven cinema scape we see today.

programme.title: Starry Eyes
programme.desc: A woman's pursuit of Hollywood stardom puts her on a collision course with a satanic cult.

programme.title: Shaky Shivers
programme.desc: Two young women find themselves at an abandoned camp in the woods with a book of magical spells, surrounded by classic monsters.

programme.title: American Mary
programme.desc: Mary Mason (Katharine Isabelle) is lured into a world of freakish surgeries for easy money.

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: Two people (Bradford Dillman, Heather Menzies) unwittingly free a mad military scientist's (Kevin McCarthy) mutant fish near a summer camp and resort lake.

programme.title: Humanoids From the Deep
programme.desc: A fisherman (Doug McClure) and a scientist (Ann Turkel) fight back when mossy sea monsters assault women.

programme.title: Sleepaway Camp
programme.desc: Bunks and the showers are a mad stabber's beat at a summer camp strictly for teens.

programme.title: Attack of the Giant Leeches
programme.desc: A bartender sends his wife (Yvette Vickers) and her lover (Michael Emmet) into a swamp where large smart leeches lurk.
